Detail Tweaker XL

by Civitai Community

Description

<p>Detail tweaker for SDXL.</p><p>Works with weights [-3, 3]</p><p>Use positive weight to increase details and negative weight to reduce details.</p><p>Good weight depends on your prompt and number of sampling steps, I recommend starting at 1.5 and then adjusting it.</p>
